title: Gold trophy?
body: I'm not sure if this image is showing, but what does the trophy under champions in the champion menu mean?

replies.body:
TimeThief with the assist! 

That's the current mastery level of Fiora. Each champion has their own overall level outside of the game that essentially gives you an idea of how well you've done with them over time. Getting higher grades will give more mastery points, and you'll level up from 1-5 as you use them. Check out our [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for all the deets ^_^!

That's the mastery rank you get mastery points for playing a champ which make you slowly Level Up Till Level 5 for rank 6/7 you need to get an s- or better for 6 and s or better for 7 which give you mastery tokens. Then you can craft the Ranks in your loot with Blue Essence.
